prompt: Create a task manager page with a retro design inspired by 80s aesthetics. Feature a top app bar with the title 'Todo Retro' in a bold, pixelated font and a notification icon. Include a floating action button with a plus icon at the bottom-right. Display a scrollable list of task cards, each with a checkbox, a bold task title in neon colors, a description in smaller text, a priority badge (red=high, yellow=medium, green=low), and a due date with a calendar icon, with a three-dot menu on the right. Use a black background, neon card borders (pink, cyan, green), and a cyan primary color scheme. Include a bottom navigation bar with 'Tasks', 'Projects', and 'Profile' tabs, using neon cyan icons. Ensure the layout is responsive, follows Material Design loosely, and emphasizes a retro, neon aesthetic.
